text: tatha un teenon[1] par jinaka maamala vilambit kar diya gaay tha, jab unapar dharatee apane vistaar ke hote sikud gayee aur unapar unake praan sankeern[2] ho gaye aur unhen vishvaas tha ki allaah ke siva unake lie koee sharanaagaar nahin, parantu usee kee or. phir unapar daya kee, taaki tauba (kshama yaachana) kar len. vaastav mein, allaah ati kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
